task.prompt: Denny is planning to build a modular home.  A 400 square foot Kitchen module costs $20000 and a 150 square foot bathroom module costs $12,000.  All other modules cost $100 per square foot.  If Denny plans to build a 2,000 square foot modular home containing one kitchen and two bathrooms, how much will it cost, in dollars?

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: Denny is planning to build a modular home.  A 400 square foot Kitchen module costs $20000 and a 150 square foot bathroom module costs $12,000.  All other modules cost $100 per square foot.  If Denny plans to build a 2,000 square foot modular home containing one kitchen and two bathrooms, how much will it cost, in dollars?
Work through the math carefully and keep intermediate values.
